{{Wireless embedded system |brand=D-Link |model=DIR-806A |revision=A1 |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=11/18/2014 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Edimax |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=common |type=wireless router |fcc_id=KA2IR806A1,NDD9562081312 |ic_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=1.2 |pwr_conn=Micro USB |cpu1_brand=Realtek |cpu1_model=RTL8881AQ |cpu1_cspeed=520 |fla1=4 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W9751G6KB-25 |serial=yes,, |wi1_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip1_model=RTL8881AQ |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL,RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |wi2_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi2_chip1_model=RTL8192ER |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL,RP-SMA |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_boot= |stock_os=Linux;2.6.30.9; |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=DIR-806A,DIR-806A-5G |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=D8:FE:E3 |oui_eth=D8:FE:E3 }} {{TagLine|Wireless AC750 Dual Band Router}} :[http://www.dlink.ru/ru/products/5/1809_b.html Product page] (DIR-806A/RU) "1244-01000905-50Z" is silkscreened on the board in the photos. :P/N: RIR806ARUA1A.A1E (H/W Ver.: A1) [[D-Link DIR-806A rev A1]] :CPU: [[Realtek]] RTL8881AQ @520MHz WiSoC (1T1R 5GHz) ::802.11a/n/ac 5GHz (433Mbps) :RAM: 64MB, Flash: 4MB :WLAN: [[Realtek]] RTL8192ER (2T2R 2.4GHz) ::802.11b/g/n 2.4GHz (300Mbps) :OUI: D8:FE:E3 See also [[D-Link DIR-803 rev A1]].. ===Reviews=== *[http://www.foxnetwork.ru/index.php/ru/component/content/article/205-d-link-dir-806a.html Review on '''FoxNetwork'''] *[http://www.ixbt.com/comm/dlink-dir-806a.shtml Review on '''iXBT'''] ===Serial===
